name: Economic Surge

criticalSuccess.msg:
A trade bonanza brings unexpected
profits. Gain 2 bonus Resource Dice at the start of your
next Kingdom turn.

success.msg:
As critical success but you gain only 1 bonus
Resource Die at the start of your next Kingdom turn.

failure.msg:
The economic surge slows for a bit; if you failed
at this check on your previous Kingdom turn, the
Economic Surge event ends.

criticalFailure.msg: The economic surge comes to an end.

resolution:
This continuous event ends following either a
critical failure or two consecutive failures on the check.
